title: Chronofile
content: [](https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgpQXr47vDnBHcMZfgLp7QpaJctazQO-GKZa7f4ZL2_5RkwZDczt_BTLszdThDXSfvwACuvu3q0ZU9BfaFM_cyoN-Uk1NqdVrILy2nnT6hdtmf2KU43vVfdc5B9e_qjzSsn4i3f/s1600-h/toontown.png)I should be heading to Trader Joe's now, before closing, but just wanted to register my enthusiasm for the emerging [ToonTown economy](http://worldgame.blogspot.com/search?q=toontown).
